com.google.android.gm.NonRestorableTextV.android:text: Gmail is built on the idea that email can be more intuitive, efficient, and useful. And maybe even fun.

TextView.android:text: Touch & hold to select one conversation, then touch to select more.
Touch a sender image to select that conversation.
No labels have been set for this account.
To view conversations in the widget, sync this label.
Mail categories group messages of the same type for reading all at once.
You can enable and disable categories in settings.

"When you sync more mail, your offline and local search experience will improve, but the initial sync may take a few minutes and consume bandwidth. It's recommended you sync the last 30 days of mail."
"This account isn't set up to sync automatically. Touch " to sync mail once, or to set up this account to sync mail automatically.
To view conversations, sync this folder.
